title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Ilia_Isorel%C3%BDs_Paulino
transformers_text:
Ilia Isorel√Ωs Paulino (born March 26, 1995) [ 1 ] [ 2 ] is an American actress, best known for her role as Lila Flores on The Sex Lives of College Girls (2021) [ 3 ] and Alvida in Netflix's live adaptation of One Piece (2023). [ 4 ]

Paulino was born in Lawrence, Massachusetts on March 26, 1995 to Dominican parents. [ 5 ] [ 1 ] [ 6 ] She has a younger sister, Noemi, who is also an actress. [ 6 ] Growing up speaking mostly Spanish , Paulino described the beginning of her path to acting as 'complicated' due to her strong accent. [ 7 ] At age 13, she and a friend auditioned for a theatre version of Beauty and the Beast , with Paulino getting the main role as the Beast. [ 1 ]

In 2013 Paulino acted in the short movie Innovation before graduating from Central Catholic High School in Lawrence. Later she studied musical theatre at DeSales University in Center Valley, Pennsylvania [ 8 ] and graduated from Yale School of Drama in 2020. [ 6 ] [ 9 ]

In 2021, she appeared in a supporting role in the featured film production Queenpins . Since that same year, Paulino has played the role of Lila Flores in the HBO Max television series The Sex Lives of College Girls . [ 3 ] [ 1 ] [ 10 ] In early March 2022, it was announced that Paulino would have played the role of pirate captain Alvida in Netflix's One Piece live-action adaptation , [ 4 ] [ 11 ] [ 12 ] [ 13 ] a role for which she shed a significant amount of weight between the first and second season. [ 14 ] [ 15 ]

On November 2023, Paulino founded Cusp of Rebirth Productions alongside Donato Fatuesi e Logan Ellis. [ 16 ] [ 17 ]
